Intro: ^You’re the one who washed up on the beach.
^You should leave if you know what’s good for you!
^There are dark forces at work in this town…
^Hello there. You must be the Elder I have heard about.
^Get away from me old man! I don’t believe in all that spiritual stuff!

c-0: ^I am Sten, yes. The elder. Mark my words… dark forces are at play in this town. They’ll see… they’ll all see!
c-1: ^Heed my warnings! Dark forces! You’ll see soon enough!

Information_1_1: ^Oh hello again... what do you want?
^Look, forget the spirits. Where have the children gone?
^I was hoping you could tell me if you've seen anything weird lately.
^I'm Revna. Could you tell me more about the "upset spirits"?

c-0: ^Forget the spirits!? Do not let the Fossegrim hear that!
c-1: ^Seen anything? No... but I have felt something. I have felt the presence of upset spirits! The Fossegrim...
c-2: ^Oh so you believe me? You are the only one... but I know about the Fossegrim.

Information_1_2: ^Heed my warnings! We have forgotten our sacred oaths to the spirits of the forest!
^I don't have anything to ask you right now.

c-0: ^Why, the forest spirit! There is also Odin, and Loki, and Thor, and...
c-1: ^What do I do? I praise the spirits of course! I keep the town safe! I...

c-0: ^Well... if Odin were to command me...
^I guess that's not enough to accuse you of anything.

c-2: ^Hmm. Well I never did trust the Cattle Herder, Gro, much. And Harold seems to have it out for me. Though he seems to like children.
^The Cattle Herder, Gro. I'll have a talk with them.
